title: This Family Speaks 1,200 Languages
description:
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.
From Madagascar to Easter Island, Austronesian tongues traveled far and wide with early seafarers.
Join Slate Plus! Members get bonus segments, exclusive member-only podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at www.slate.com/podcastsplus.
